title: Value Function Evaluation with Data Augmentation for Offline Reinforcement Learning
details: X Zhou, C Zhang, Y Lin, S Yu - International Conference on Intelligent Computing, 2024
abstract: Offline reinforcement learning, also known as batch reinforcement learning, aims to utilize pre-collected offline datasets for training without further interaction with the environment. It is suitable for training in complex real-world environments. However …

title: Statistical Feature-based Search for Multivariate Time Series Forecasting
details: J PAN, Y WANG, B ZHONG, X WANG - 电子与信息学报, 2024
abstract: There are long-term dependencies, such as trends, seasonality, and periodicity in time series, which may span several months. It is insufficient to apply existing methods in modeling the long-term dependencies of the series explicitly. To address …
